title: Le Capannine di Sommavilla
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Organic, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located just after Sant'Andrea di Sorbello, on the left in the direction of Umbertide. Owner Cristina makes an inexpensive buffet brunch and lunch on Sundays, as well as evening meals. Organic produce, wines, preserves. Has Wi-Fi. Movies shown on Sunday evenings in the winter.
